title: Jenga (feat. Gaeko)
lyrics:
I just wanted to play this game
Salang-ilan gamjeong-e
Maelyodwae nal gadeug chaewossne
Nuga sikin jeogdo eobsneunde
Tab-eul ssah-aollyeossne
Nan neoui jogagdeullo ppaegoghae

Nae mam-eul chaeun neoui nunkoibgwa

Neoui teug-yuui maltuwa eog-yang

Siya-eseo heulishaejyeogal ttaemyeon

Hwicheong-geoline naui haluga

Nae mam-e sumanh-eun gumeong-i nado

Beotil su issneun iyun neolago

Ije nega han baljjagman deo

Bal-eul ppaemyeon nan muneojil tende



I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help

I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help



Tab-i muneojigo namyeon

Pyeheoga dwaebeolilkka bwa

Penseuleul duleugo

Yujeogjilo dumyeon eotteolkka

Il-eonajido anh-eun il-eul sangsanghamyeo

Ieumsaeleul butdeulgo issneun naleul

Neoneun jeoncheoleom balaboji anh-a

Uli salang-eul pisaui satab-ila

Saeng-gagji anhjanh-a

I geim-ui kkeut-eul junbihage haejwo

Sseuleojil ttaen amudo eobsge

Gugyeong-geoli doeji anhge

Nae mam-eul chaeun neoui nunkoibgwa

Neoui teug-yuui maltuwa eog-yang

Siya-eseo heulishaejyeogal ttaemyeon

Hwicheong-geoline naui haluga

Nae mam-e sumanh-eun gumeong-i nado

Beotil su issneun iyun neolago

Ije nega han baljjagman deo

Bal-eul ppaemyeon nan muneojil tende



I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help

I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help



Balam-i bul-eowa

Deo isang mos beotil geos gat-a

Dasi chaewojumyeon an doelkka

Nae mam-eun gud-eoga

Uimileul ilh-eun geos gat-a



I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help

I don't wanna play this game no more

Somebody help
